There were no other sightings in Battle Creek on or around August 1st 2011
divs: sighting details last night(08\31\2011), here in battle creek, mi. about 9:20 pm (not really sure about the exact time) i was talking with a friend in front of his house, when suddenly a big (far bigger than an airplane) white light, on the sky got my attention. i asked him to watch the sky, he agreed with me 100% that wasn't a plane or chopter, no flashing lights or colors, solid glowing white light, flying from north to sw (think so), i'm not sure about the altitude, but i would say about 3000 feet, speed? faster than a comercial flight (relative, depending on real distance), maybe 1.5 times faster. i try to take a picture but was hard to find it and focus it. then, before getting lost over the horizon (line of houses across a parking lot) it dimmed slowly, till dissapeared. there was no engine or electrical noise, nothing. the whole thing took about 25-35 seconds. it was awsome!!
Summary: Very bright white light crossing the night sky.
